## Components

- **Navbar:** A simple navbar with a logo and links.
- **Hero:** A hero section with a title, subtitle, and a call-to-action button.
- **About:** An about section with a profile picture and a description.
- **Experience:** A section to showcase your work experience.
- **Projects:** A section to showcase your projects.
- **Links:** A section to showcase your social media links.
